name: Tanksering LAN Mode
description:
This is a LAN Version of Tanksering. This game makes the Original Tanksering Game in a more compatible version, giving it connectivity to people who are connected to these connections such as Internet, Hotspot, and others.

Note: THIS ALT GAME DOESN'T SUPPORT INTERNATIONAL, OUTSIDE, OR INTERNATIONAL SERVER CONNECTIONS. THIS GAME IS ONLY INTENDED FOR PLAYERS HAVING LIMITED OR NO ACCESS TO INTERNET DATA CONNECTION. IF YOU WANT TO PLAY WITH PEOPLE OUTSIDE OF YOUR INTERNET, PLAY THE ORIGINAL TANKSERING GAME.
